title: Dakine Drift Flat Pedal Mountain Bike Shoes launch under Hannah Bergemann
content:
Dakine have released the new Drift mountain bike shoe. Available in a flat pedal version only, the aim here isn’t to win races, but to be the shoe you’ll wear for a good corner slapping session in the woods with your mates.
